basic.description:
Introduction to the systematic construction of a compiler: grammars and languages, scanners, top-down and bottom-up parsing, runtime organization, symbol tables, internal representations; Polish notation, syntax trees, semantic routines, storage allocation, code generation, interpreters. Jim Cordy.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;36Lb;48P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Programming Language Processors (S)

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     CISC121 and CISC221 and CISC223
